text: Addams Family Values is a 1993 American supernatural black comedy movie directed by Barry Sonnenfeld and written by Paul Rudnick. It is based on the characters created by Charles Addams. It is the sequel to The Addams Family (1991). It stars Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci, Carel Struycken, Jimmy Workman, and Christopher Hart with Joan Cusack. It was released on November 19, 1993 to positive reviews and was Julia's last movie before his death in 1994. ==References== Category:1993 movies Category:Sequel movies Category:American supernatural movies Category:American black comedy movies
title: Addams Family Values
